item.cayafmod.ring_of_veiner.line1: Breaks most veins around the player

item.cayafmod.ring_of_veiner.line3: Shift + right-click to break veins, with drops
item.cayafmod.ring_of_veiner.line5: Right-click to break veins, with drops
item.cayafmod.ring_of_veiner.line6: Shift + right-click to break veins, no drops
